%1 minute.comment: 很多地方没有秒就很奇怪：“每 1 分 更新一次”，不过个别情况可能会有 1分钟30秒 这种奇葩。

[Upgrade name 521]Metagrandmas.comment: 避免和'元老'用词混淆，meta前缀改翻译为超元

[Upgrade name 522]Metabakeries.comment: 避免和'元老'用词混淆，meta前缀改翻译为超元

Click to win!.comment: 这两个比较迷惑，不过目前只有成就在用，希望以后更新不会复用。

Only use mods from trusted sources. Some.english: Only use mods from trusted sources. Some mods may require a game restart to take effect.
Only use mods from trusted sources. Some.chinese: 务必使用来自可信来源的模组。有些模组可能需要重启游戏才能生效。

No Cloud access at the moment..english: No Cloud access at the moment.

There are no heralds at the moment. Plea.english: There are no heralds at the moment. Please consider donating to our Patreon!
There are no heralds at the moment. Plea.chinese: 当前没有使者。请考虑向我们的 Patreon 捐赠！!

A local news station runs a 10-minute se.english:
A local news station runs a 10-minute segment about your cookies. Success!
(you win a cookie)
A local news station runs a 10-minute se.chinese:
一家本地新闻台对你做的饼干进行了10分钟的报道。收效卓著！
（你赢得一块饼干）

allow use of Steam Cloud for save backup.english: allow use of Steam Cloud for save backups
allow use of Steam Cloud for save backup.chinese: 允许使用Steam云存档服务备份存档

add options on buildings like Mute.comment: 虽然是Mute，但是指的是隐藏建筑，目前没发现音量相关的功能真的有用Mute。希望以后不会有复用。
add options on buildings like Mute.english: add options on buildings like Mute
add options on buildings like Mute.chinese: 在建筑上增加选项，如：折叠

Muted:.comment: 形象翻译，如果以后有音量相关的复用了这个文本再考虑改成别的

on slower computers, the game will put i.english: on slower computers, the game will put itself in sleep mode when it's inactive and starts to lag out; offline CpS production kicks in during sleep mode
on slower computers, the game will put i.chinese: 在运行速度较慢的电脑上，当处于非活动状态且开始出现延迟现象后，游戏会进入睡眠模式；睡眠模式期间离线 CpS 生产点击仍然有效。

This tile of soil is empty.<br>Pick a se.english:
This tile of soil is empty.
Pick a seed and plant something!
This tile of soil is empty.<br>Pick a se.chinese:
该格子土是空的。
选一粒种子，种点东西吧！

You harvested <b>%1</b> while you were a.english: You harvested %1 while you were away.

You earned <b>%1</b> while you were away.english: You earned %1 while you were away.

Exploded a shiny wrinkler.chinese: 戳爆了一条闪光饼干虫

Burst the near-extinct <b>shiny wrinkler.chinese: 戳爆濒临灭绝的饼干虫品种——闪光饼干虫。

[Upgrade quote 2]Ambidextrous.chinese: 妈，快看！我可以双手并用！

[Upgrade quote 5]Billion fingers.chinese: 鼠标点击鼠标点击鼠标点击。

[Upgrade quote 6]Trillion fingers.chinese: 点击、点击、点击、点击、点击、点……

[Upgrade name 7]Forwards from grandma.comment: 邮件梗，为什么是先锋啊？

[Upgrade quote 7]Forwards from grandma.english: RE:RE:thought you'd get a kick out of this ;))
[Upgrade quote 7]Forwards from grandma.chinese: 回复：回复：我觉得你会喜欢这样 ^-^

[Upgrade quote 14]Child labor.chinese: 便宜又健康的人力资源。

[Upgrade quote 15]Sweatshop.chinese: 摸鱼的都可以处理掉了。

[Upgrade quote 16]Sugar gas.english: A pink, volatile gas, found in the depths of some chocolate caves.
[Upgrade quote 16]Sugar gas.chinese: 易逝的粉色气体，在巧克力洞穴的最深处才能找到。

[Upgrade quote 19]Vanilla nebulae.english:
If you removed your space helmet, you could probably smell it!
(Note : don't do that.)
[Upgrade quote 19]Vanilla nebulae.chinese:
如果想要闻到星云的香草味，你需要摘下你的宇航头盔。
（注：请不要摘下宇航头盔）

[Upgrade quote 20]Wormholes.english: By using these as shortcuts, your ships can travel much faster.
[Upgrade quote 20]Wormholes.chinese: 这些捷径可给你的飞船航行减少了不少行程。

[Upgrade quote 22]Antimony.english: Actually worth a lot of mony.

[Upgrade quote 23]Essence of dough.english: Extracted through the 5 ancient steps of alchemical baking.
[Upgrade quote 23]Essence of dough.chinese: 经过五个远古炼金烘焙步骤提取而成。

[Upgrade quote 25]Ancient tablet.english: A strange slab of peanut brittle, holding an ancient cookie recipe. Neat!
[Upgrade quote 25]Ancient tablet.chinese: 一块奇怪的花生脆片，里面装着古老的饼干食谱。不错！

[Upgrade quote 27]Soul bond.english: So I just sign up and get more cookies? Sure, whatever!
[Upgrade quote 27]Soul bond.chinese: 所以我只要签了这张纸就能拥有更多的饼干？好啊，何乐不为？

[Upgrade quote 29]Time paradox resolver.english: No more fooling around with your own grandmother!
[Upgrade quote 29]Time paradox resolver.chinese: 别再折腾你的亲奶奶了！

[Upgrade quote 30]Quantum conundrum.english:
There is only one constant, and that is universal uncertainty.
Or is it?
[Upgrade quote 30]Quantum conundrum.chinese:
世界上只有一个真正的常量，那就是普遍的不确定性。
但是真的是这样吗？

[Upgrade quote 31]Kitten helpers.chinese: 有什么我可以帮到你的喵？

[Upgrade quote 33]Plain cookies.chinese: 万事开头难，但是总得有个开头吧。

[Upgrade quote 34]Sugar cookies.chinese: 不管有没有创意，好吃就行。

[Upgrade quote 35]Oatmeal raisin cookies.comment: 没什么好的双关方法，直接换了个句子。
[Upgrade quote 35]Oatmeal raisin cookies.chinese: 吃葡萄干真不用吐葡萄皮。

[Upgrade quote 37]Coconut cookies.english: Flaky, but not unreliable. Some people go crazy for these.
[Upgrade quote 37]Coconut cookies.chinese: 拿起来就掉渣，但是又不会直接散架。有的人喜欢这种喜欢到死。

[Upgrade quote 38]White chocolate cookie.english:
I know what you'll say. It's just cocoa butter! It's not real chocolate!
Oh please.
[Upgrade quote 38]White chocolate cookie.chinese:
我知道你要说什么。不就是可可脂吗！又不是真的巧克力！
快得了吧。

[Upgrade quote 40]Double-chip cookies.english:
DOUBLE THE CHIPS
DOUBLE THE TASTY
(double the calories)
[Upgrade quote 40]Double-chip cookies.chinese:
双倍可可！
双倍享受！
（双倍卡路里）

[Upgrade quote 43]Quadrillion fingers.chinese: 点击点击点击点击点击点击点击点击点击点击点……

[Upgrade quote 44]Prune juice.chinese: 喝了会舒畅的不只是心情。

[Upgrade quote 46]Radium reactors.english: Gives your cookies a healthy glow.

[Upgrade quote 49]Ambrosia.english:
Adding this to the cookie mix is sure to make them even more addictive!
Perhaps dangerously so.
Let's hope you can keep selling these legally.
[Upgrade quote 49]Ambrosia.chinese:
加了这个果然能让饼干更加给劲！
不过似乎有点太给劲了。
看你这饼干还能合法卖多久吧。

[Upgrade quote 50]Sanity dance.comment: 歌词梗"Safety Dance"，大概没必要翻译成原意。
[Upgrade quote 50]Sanity dance.english:
We can change if we want to.
We can leave our brains behind.
[Upgrade quote 50]Sanity dance.chinese:
超高级的技巧。
用脑子跳舞。

[Upgrade quote 51]Causality enforcer.comment: 没翻译原文，感觉这个更有意思。
[Upgrade quote 51]Causality enforcer.chinese: 种瓜得瓜，种饼干得饼干。

[Upgrade quote 53]Serendipity.chinese: 今天是个好日子，心想的事儿都能成！

[Upgrade quote 55]Dark chocolate-coated.english: These absorb light so well you almost need to squint to see them.
[Upgrade quote 55]Dark chocolate-coated.chinese: 这玩意黑得晚上用手电筒照着都可能看不见。

[Upgrade quote 56]White chocolate-coated.english: These dazzling cookies absolutely glisten with flavor.
[Upgrade quote 56]White chocolate-coated.chinese: 这些晃眼的饼干，口味也十分闪耀。

[Upgrade quote 57]Farmer grandmas.english: A nice farmer to grow more cookies.
[Upgrade quote 57]Farmer grandmas.chinese: 善良的农民可以种植出更多饼干。

[Upgrade quote 58]Miner grandmas.english: A nice miner to dig more cookies.
[Upgrade quote 58]Miner grandmas.chinese: 善良的矿工可以开采出更多饼干。

[Upgrade quote 59]Worker grandmas.english: A nice worker to manufacture more cookies.
[Upgrade quote 59]Worker grandmas.chinese: 善良的工人可以组装出更多饼干。

[Upgrade quote 60]Cosmic grandmas.english: A nice thing to... uh... cookies.
[Upgrade quote 60]Cosmic grandmas.chinese: 善良的存在可以、呃……，饼干。

[Upgrade quote 61]Transmuted grandmas.english: A nice golden grandma to convert into more cookies.
[Upgrade quote 61]Transmuted grandmas.chinese: 善良的金奶奶可以转化成更多饼干。

[Upgrade quote 63]Grandmas' grandmas.english: A nice grandma's nice grandma to bake double the cookies.
[Upgrade quote 63]Grandmas' grandmas.chinese: 善良的老奶奶的善良老奶奶可以烘焙出双倍的饼干。

[Upgrade quote 64]Bingo center/Research.comment: bingo双关，臣妾做不到。只能用bingo是个赌博游戏的概念翻了。
[Upgrade quote 64]Bingo center/Research.english:
What could possibly keep those grandmothers in check?...
Bingo.
[Upgrade quote 64]Bingo center/Research.chinese:
没什么能比健康的赌博更吸引老奶奶的注意力了。
你说是不是？

[Upgrade quote 65]Specialized chocolate.english: Computer-designed chocolate chips. Computer chips, if you will.
[Upgrade quote 65]Specialized chocolate.chinese: 电脑设计出来的巧克力。如果你想的话，可以叫这东西：夹芯巧克力。

[Upgrade quote 66]Designer cocoa beans.chinese: 出色的可可豆，如今更符合空气动力学设计！

[Upgrade quote 67]Ritual rolling pins.english: The result of years of scientific research!

[Upgrade quote 68]Underworld ovens.chinese: 当然还是科学创造出来的！

[Upgrade quote 69]One mind.english: We are one. We are many.

[Upgrade quote 70]Exotic nuts.chinese: 你会忍不住想要尝一口的！

[Upgrade quote 71]Communal brainsweep.english: We fuse. We merge. We grow.

[Upgrade quote 72]Arcane sugar.english: Tastes like insects, ligaments, and molasses.
[Upgrade quote 72]Arcane sugar.chinese: 有股昆虫的味道，亦或是韧带的味道。不过依然有蜜糖的味道。

[Upgrade quote 73]Elder Pact.english:
squirm crawl slither writhe
today we rise
[Upgrade quote 73]Elder Pact.chinese:
爬行、滑行、蠕动、扭动
今日，吾等崛起之日

[Upgrade quote 74]Elder Pledge.english: This is a simple ritual involving anti-aging cream, cookie batter mixed in the moonlight, and a live chicken.
[Upgrade quote 74]Elder Pledge.chinese: 这是个利用抗衰老面霜、用月光和成的饼干面糊和一只活鸡进行的简单祭祀仪式。

[Upgrade quote 76]Iron mouse.chinese: 狂点出重金属的旋律吧！

[Upgrade quote 77]Titanium mouse.chinese: 沉重而有力。我是在说点击时发出的声音。

[Upgrade quote 78]Adamantium mouse.english: You could cut diamond with these.
[Upgrade quote 78]Adamantium mouse.chinese: 这玩意连钻石都能轻松切开。

[Upgrade quote 80]Eclipse cookies.chinese: 请不要用肉眼观看这块饼干。

[Upgrade quote 82]Quintillion fingers.english: man, just go click click click click click, it's real easy, man.
[Upgrade quote 82]Quintillion fingers.chinese: 讲道理，不就是点点点点点点点点点吗？小菜一碟啊。

[Upgrade quote 84]Elder Covenant.english:
This is a complicated ritual involving silly, inconsequential trivialities such as cursed laxatives, century-old cacao, and an infant.
Don't question it.
[Upgrade quote 84]Elder Covenant.chinese:
这个复杂的祭祀仪式需要用一些滑稽又没用的小玩意，比如被诅咒的泻药、百年的可可豆和一个婴儿。
别问我，我也不懂。

[Upgrade quote 86]Get lucky.english: You've been up all night, haven't you?
[Upgrade quote 86]Get lucky.chinese: 你是不是一整晚没睡啊。

[Upgrade quote 87]Sacrificial rolling pi.english:
These are mostly just for spreading the anti-aging cream.
(And accessorily, shortening the chicken's suffering.)
[Upgrade quote 87]Sacrificial rolling pi.chinese:
这些其实只是用来涂抹抗老化面霜用的。
（顺带能快速结束祭品鸡的痛苦罢了。）

[Upgrade quote 89]Stroopwafels.english: If it ain't dutch, it ain't much.
[Upgrade quote 89]Stroopwafels.chinese: 不是河南产的。不过其实也不是荷兰产的，毕竟是我们在这烤的。

[Upgrade quote 90]Macaroons.english:
Not to be confused with macarons.
These have coconut, okay?
[Upgrade quote 90]Macaroons.chinese:
别称马卡蓉，可别和杏仁饼马卡龙搞混了。
这种是用椰蓉做的好伐？

[Upgrade quote 91]Neuromancy.english: Can also come in handy to unsee things that can't be unseen.
[Upgrade quote 91]Neuromancy.chinese: 在想要忘记看过不该看的东西的时候也挺有用的。

[Upgrade quote 92]Empire biscuits.english: For your growing cookie empire, of course!
[Upgrade quote 92]Empire biscuits.chinese: 小人不才，这是臣为陛下发扬饼干帝国的野心而准备的！

[Upgrade quote 94]Chocolate british tea.chinese: 但是巧克力牛奶是禁忌！不过巧克力口味的甜点就可以。

[Upgrade quote 96]Round chocolate britis.chinese: 这形状很容易掉进茶杯里，请不要把饼干架在茶杯沿上。

[Upgrade quote 97]Round british tea bisc.english: Yes, quite riveting indeed, old chap.
[Upgrade quote 97]Round british tea bisc.chinese: 添加个图案并不能解决很容易掉进茶杯里的问题。

[Upgrade quote 98]Round chocolate britis.chinese: 我觉得我还是更喜欢饼干。

[Upgrade quote 99]Sugar bosons.chinese:
甜美酥脆的玻色子。
(绝对不是巧克力豆。)

[Upgrade quote 100]String theory.english: Reveals new insight about the true meaning of baking cookies (and, as a bonus, the structure of the universe).
[Upgrade quote 100]String theory.chinese:
科学终于可以解释烘焙饼干的真正意义了。
（不过也顺带解释了宇宙的结构）

[Upgrade quote 101]Large macaron collide.chinese: 配备了超级饼干同步加速器。

[Upgrade quote 102]Big bang bake.english: And that's how it all began.
[Upgrade quote 102]Big bang bake.chinese: 一切的一切都是从这一刻开始的。

[Upgrade quote 103]Antigrandmas.english: A mean antigrandma to vomit more cookies.
[Upgrade quote 103]Antigrandmas.chinese: 吝啬的老奶奶可以吐出更多的饼干。

[Upgrade quote 106]Palets.english:
You could probably play hockey with these.
I mean, you're welcome to try.
[Upgrade quote 106]Palets.chinese:
这东西大概能当冰球打。
我是说，你试试就知道了。

[Upgrade quote 107]Sabl&eacute;s.english: The name implies they're made of sand. But you know better, don't you?
[Upgrade quote 107]Sabl&eacute;s.chinese: 虽然表面上说是酥饼。但你比我更清楚实际上是什么材料做的。

[Upgrade quote 108]Kitten overseers.english: my purrpose is to serve you, sir

[Upgrade quote 109]Sextillion fingers.chinese:
有的时候
点击欲望
一触即发

[Upgrade quote 110]Double-thick glasses.english: Oh... so THAT's what I've been baking.
[Upgrade quote 110]Double-thick glasses.chinese: 喔……所以我原来一直在烤的是这玩意。

[Upgrade quote 111]Gingerbread scarecrow.english: Staring at your crops with mischievous glee.
[Upgrade quote 111]Gingerbread scarecrow.chinese: 始终带着调皮的笑容盯着你的田地。

[Upgrade quote 112]Recombobulators.english: A major part of cookie recombobulation.

[Upgrade quote 113]H-bomb mining.chinese: 效率实属可疑，但是实在是太炫酷了。

[Upgrade quote 114]Chocolate monoliths.english: My god. It's full of chocolate bars.
[Upgrade quote 114]Chocolate monoliths.chinese: 天哪。它何止是一级棒，简直是巧克力棒。

[Upgrade quote 115]Aqua crustulae.english:
Careful with the dosing - one drop too much and you get muffins.
And nobody likes muffins.
[Upgrade quote 115]Aqua crustulae.chinese:
称重的时候要小心——多掺了一滴水就变成了松饼。
而且没人喜欢松饼。

[Upgrade quote 116]Brane transplant.english: This refers to the practice of merging higher dimensional universes, or "branes", with our own, in order to facilitate transit (and harvesting of precious cookie dough).
[Upgrade quote 116]Brane transplant.chinese: 这是种能够将高维度宇宙和我们的宇宙连接起来的技术。这种高维度宇宙其实是一种成为“膜”的物体，连接后的膜将为我们提供更方便的运输手段（顺便可以从高维宇宙中收获宝贵的饼干面糊）。

[Upgrade quote 118]Reverse cyclotrons.english: These can uncollision particles and unspin atoms. For... uh... better flavor, and stuff.
[Upgrade quote 118]Reverse cyclotrons.chinese: 这些可以避免粒子碰撞和解除原子自旋，从而……呃………获得更好的口感，还是什么的。

[Upgrade quote 119]Unobtainium mouse.chinese: 那些不难得的老鼠大概已经足够用了。

[Upgrade quote 120]Caramoas.english: Yeah. That's got a nice ring to it.

[Upgrade quote 123]Win mints.english: They're the luckiest cookies you've ever tasted!
[Upgrade quote 123]Win mints.chinese: 这些大概是你尝过的最薄荷理的幸运饼干了！

[Upgrade quote 124]Perfect idling.english: It's the most beautiful thing I've ever seen.
[Upgrade quote 124]Perfect idling.chinese: 再也没有比这更完美的东西了。

[Upgrade quote 126]Loreols.chinese: 因为，呃……这些比奥利奥更值钱？

[Upgrade quote 127]Jaffa cakes.english: If you want to bake a cookie from scratch, you must first build a factory.
[Upgrade quote 127]Jaffa cakes.chinese: 如果你想从头开始烤个饼干出来，你需要先造个工厂出来。

[Upgrade quote 128]Grease's cups.chinese: 黄油和花生酱完全没区别嘛。

[Upgrade quote 129]Heavenly chip secret.english:
Grants the knowledge of heavenly chips, and how to use them to make baking more efficient.
It's a secret to everyone.
[Upgrade quote 129]Heavenly chip secret.chinese:
上天赋予了你天堂碎片，还顺带快递给你了一本食谱《只需一招，简单利用天堂碎片提高烘焙效率》。
世上独此一本喔。

[Upgrade quote 130]Heavenly cookie stand.english: Don't forget to visit the heavenly lemonade stand afterwards. When afterlife gives you lemons...
[Upgrade quote 130]Heavenly cookie stand.chinese:
之后别忘了也去天堂柠檬水铺看看。毕竟天堂给你了柠檬……
你就可以把柠檬换成饼干币去店里买柠檬水了。

[Upgrade quote 131]Heavenly bakery.english: Also sells godly cakes and divine pastries. The pretzels aren't too bad either.
[Upgrade quote 131]Heavenly bakery.chinese: 这里也卖敬虔蛋糕和神圣点心。他们的椒盐脆饼也不错。

[Upgrade quote 132]Heavenly confectioner.english: They say angel bakers work there. They take angel lunch breaks and sometimes go on angel strikes.
[Upgrade quote 132]Heavenly confectioner.chinese: 据说有天使蛋糕师在这里工作。他们每天有固定的天使午休，不爽了偶尔也会天使罢工。

[Upgrade quote 133]Heavenly key.english:
This is the key to the pearly (and tasty) gates of pastry heaven, granting you access to your entire stockpile of heavenly chips for baking purposes.
May you use them wisely.
[Upgrade quote 133]Heavenly key.chinese:
这把钥匙能打开通往点心天堂的珍珠般的（亦或是可口的）大门。到时点心天堂的厨房仓库里有一大批天堂碎片等着你。
不过还是建议你计划好用量。

[Upgrade quote 134]Skull cookies.english: Wanna know something spooky? You've got one of these inside your head RIGHT NOW.
[Upgrade quote 134]Skull cookies.chinese: 想听个鬼故事吗？你脑子里现在就有个！

[Upgrade quote 135]Ghost cookies.english: They're something strange, but they look pretty good!
[Upgrade quote 135]Ghost cookies.chinese: 按理来说这些是残次品，不过看起来还是很好吃！

[Upgrade quote 136]Bat cookies.chinese: 这样的镇子配这样的饼干。

[Upgrade quote 137]Slime cookies.chinese:
难以置信的柔软！
不过小心别被粘住了。

[Upgrade quote 138]Pumpkin cookies.english: Not even pumpkin-flavored. Tastes like glazing. Yeugh.
[Upgrade quote 138]Pumpkin cookies.chinese: 连点南瓜味都没有。全是那层糖衣的味道。唉……

[Upgrade quote 139]Eyeball cookies.english: When you stare into the cookie, the cookie stares back at you.
[Upgrade quote 139]Eyeball cookies.chinese: 如果你盯着这饼干看，你会发现这饼干也在盯着你看。

[Upgrade quote 140]Spider cookies.english: You found the recipe on the web. They do whatever a cookie can.
[Upgrade quote 140]Spider cookies.chinese: 这是你在网上找到的食谱。倒是满足了作为饼干的所有条件。

[Upgrade quote 141]Persistent memory.chinese:
啊！我终于开始明白了！
和上次发现的一样！

[Upgrade quote 142]Wrinkler doormat.chinese: 怎么就让你说服我买这个了呢？

[Upgrade quote 143]Christmas tree biscui.chinese: 这又是谁橡树来的主意？

[Upgrade quote 144]Snowflake biscuits.english: Mass-produced to be unique in every way.

[Upgrade quote 145]Snowman biscuits.chinese: 上面撒了糖霜。不过可能看不太出来。

[Upgrade quote 146]Holly biscuits.english: You don't smooch under these ones. That would be the mistletoe (which, botanically, is a smellier variant of the mistlefinger).
[Upgrade quote 146]Holly biscuits.chinese: 冬青树上冬青果，冬青树下你和我。

[Upgrade quote 147]Candy cane biscuits.english:
It's two treats in one!
(Further inspection reveals the frosting does not actually taste like peppermint, but like mundane sugary frosting.)
[Upgrade quote 147]Candy cane biscuits.chinese:
一根糖果，两种口味！
（仔细尝了下发现两个颜色的味道并没有差别。都是普通的糖浆味而已。）

[Upgrade quote 148]Bell biscuits.english: What do these even have to do with christmas? Who cares, ring them in!
[Upgrade quote 148]Bell biscuits.chinese: 这钟和圣诞有什么关系吗？管它呢，反正很多人对这饼干情有独钟。

[Upgrade quote 149]Present biscuits.english: The prequel to future biscuits. Watch out!
[Upgrade quote 149]Present biscuits.chinese: 外物饼干的死敌。可要小心！

[Upgrade quote 150]Gingerbread men.english: You like to bite the legs off first, right? How about tearing off the arms? You sick monster.
[Upgrade quote 150]Gingerbread men.chinese:
你是喜欢先咬断腿呢？还是先撕断胳膊呢？
心理变态。

[Upgrade quote 151]Gingerbread trees.english: Evergreens in pastry form. Yule be surprised what you can come up with.
[Upgrade quote 151]Gingerbread trees.chinese: 甜点形态的常青树。我是搞不懂为什么大家都喜欢做姜紫的形状。

[Upgrade quote 152]A festive hat.english: Not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse.
[Upgrade quote 152]A festive hat.chinese: 叮叮当，叮叮当，铃儿响叮当。

[Upgrade quote 153]Increased merriness.english:
It turns out that the key to increased merriness, strangely enough, happens to be a good campfire and some s'mores.
You know what they say, after all; the s'more, the merrier.
[Upgrade quote 153]Increased merriness.chinese:
谁都没想到，快乐就是这么容易的东西。
只要大家和我们一起唱，快乐其实也没有什么道理。

[Upgrade quote 154]Improved jolliness.english:
A nice wobbly belly goes a long way.
You jolly?
[Upgrade quote 154]Improved jolliness.chinese:
挺着个大肚子走来走去的那位一直都是快乐的象征。
喔，我不是在说你。

[Upgrade quote 155]A lump of coal.english:
Some of the world's worst stocking stuffing.
I guess you could try starting your own little industrial revolution, or something?...
[Upgrade quote 155]A lump of coal.chinese:
你收到了这世界上最糟糕的礼物。
不过你大概可以试试用它发起一场工业革命，之类的……

[Upgrade quote 156]An itchy sweater.english: You don't know what's worse : the embarrassingly quaint "elf on reindeer" motif, or the fact that wearing it makes you feel like you're wrapped in a dead sasquatch.
[Upgrade quote 156]An itchy sweater.chinese: 都不知道该从哪吐槽好——是身前尴尬的驯鹿精灵图案？还是身上被狼人拥抱的触感？

[Upgrade quote 157]Reindeer baking groun.english: Male reindeer are from Mars; female reindeer are from venison.
[Upgrade quote 157]Reindeer baking groun.chinese: 雄驯鹿是从火星来的；雌驯鹿是鹿肉拼的。

[Upgrade quote 158]Weighted sleighs.english:
Hope it was worth the weight.
(Something something forced into cervidude)
[Upgrade quote 158]Weighted sleighs.chinese:
希望这漫长的研发能让用户开橇。
（可以随产品附带针对颈椎病的医疗保险）

[Upgrade quote 159]Ho ho ho-flavored fro.english: It's time to up the antler.
[Upgrade quote 159]Ho ho ho-flavored fro.chinese: 是时候为鹿茸誉奋力一搏了。

[Upgrade quote 160]Season savings.english:
By Santa's beard, what savings!
But who will save us?
[Upgrade quote 160]Season savings.chinese:
促销活动！可以用圣诞老人的胡须作为代金券！
但是谁来负责发放代金券呢？

[Upgrade quote 161]Toy workshop.english:
Watch yours-elf around elvesdroppers who might steal our production secrets.
Or elven worse!
[Upgrade quote 161]Toy workshop.chinese:
请随身携带好您的贵重物品，从指定地点有序地投放到圣诞老人的礼物袋子里。
想要用手机支付红包的顾客，请先兑换成现金再投放！

[Upgrade quote 162]Naughty list.english:
This list contains every unholy deed perpetuated by grandmakind.
He won't be checking this one twice.
Once. Once is enough.
[Upgrade quote 162]Naughty list.chinese:
这是份记录了所有老奶奶犯下的恶行的日志。
不过圣诞老人总是忘了云备份。
偷偷改两笔不会被发现的。

[Upgrade quote 163]Santa's bottomless ba.english: This is one bottom you can't check out.
[Upgrade quote 163]Santa's bottomless ba.chinese: 你这么说，我就更没底了。

[Upgrade quote 164]Santa's helpers.english:
Some choose to help hamburger; some choose to help you.
To each their own, I guess.
[Upgrade quote 164]Santa's helpers.chinese:
有的选择帮助汉堡；有的选择帮助你。
可能帮你也不是多坏的事吧。

[Upgrade quote 165]Santa's legacy.english: In the north pole, you gotta get the elves first. Then when you get the elves, you start making the toys. Then when you get the toys... then you get the cookies.
[Upgrade quote 165]Santa's legacy.chinese:
要去北极取经的话，你要先抓一只精灵。抓到精灵以后，要去学会做玩具。等你做出来玩具，你就会得到饼干……做的经书。
我也不知道精灵是用来做什么的。

[Upgrade quote 166]Santa's milk and cook.english: Part of Santa's dreadfully unbalanced diet.
[Upgrade quote 166]Santa's milk and cook.chinese: 不过是圣诞老人不均衡的饮食其中的一道菜罢了/

[Upgrade quote 167]Reindeer season.english: Go, Cheater! Go, Hacker and Faker!

[Upgrade quote 168]Santa's dominion.english:
My name is Claus, king of kings;
Look on my toys, ye Mighty, and despair!
[Upgrade quote 168]Santa's dominion.chinese:
吾名克劳斯，众王之王；
在我威武的玩具军团面前屈服吧！

[Upgrade quote 169]Pure heart biscuits.english:
Melty white chocolate
that says "I *like* like you".
[Upgrade quote 169]Pure heart biscuits.chinese:
快融化的白色巧克力。
上面写着："我真的真的喜欢你"。

[Upgrade quote 170]Ardent heart biscuits.english: A red hot cherry biscuit that will nudge the target of your affection in interesting directions.
[Upgrade quote 170]Ardent heart biscuits.chinese: 一个能将你的攻略路线往有趣的方向发展的火红色樱桃饼干。

[Upgrade quote 171]Sour heart biscuits.english: A bitter lime biscuit for the lonely and the heart-broken.
[Upgrade quote 171]Sour heart biscuits.chinese: 为孤独的失心之人准备的苦涩青柠饼干。

[Upgrade quote 172]Weeping heart biscuit.english: An ice-cold blueberry biscuit, symbol of a mending heart.
[Upgrade quote 172]Weeping heart biscuit.chinese: 冰镇的蓝莓饼干，是心灵缓慢修复的象征。

[Upgrade quote 173]Golden heart biscuits.english: A beautiful biscuit to symbolize kindness, true love, and sincerity.
[Upgrade quote 173]Golden heart biscuits.chinese: 一个象征着善良、挚爱与真诚的美丽饼干。

[Upgrade quote 174]Eternal heart biscuit.english: Silver icing for a very special someone you've liked for a long, long time.
[Upgrade quote 174]Eternal heart biscuit.chinese: 为了你钟意许久的心上人，光是这层银色糖衣，都准备了很长、很长时间。

[Upgrade quote 175]Gem polish.english:
Get rid of the grime and let more light in.
Truly, truly outrageous.
[Upgrade quote 175]Gem polish.chinese:
用心打磨瑕疵，让它闪闪发光。
而且是真的能闪瞎人眼的那种闪。

[Upgrade quote 176]9th color.english: Delve into untouched optical depths where even the mantis shrimp hasn't set an eye!
[Upgrade quote 176]9th color.chinese: 从光谱的终点发现的连变色龙都从未见过的独特色彩。

[Upgrade quote 177]Chocolate light.english:
Bask into its cocoalescence.
(Warning : may cause various interesting albeit deadly skin conditions.)
[Upgrade quote 177]Chocolate light.chinese:
沉浸在它的照射之中。
（警告：可能会引发各种有趣的皮肤病，个别情况有致命危险。）

[Upgrade quote 178]Grainbow.english: Remember the different grains using the handy Roy G. Biv mnemonic : R is for rice, O is for oats... uh, B for barley?...
[Upgrade quote 178]Grainbow.chinese: 想要记住所有谷物的名字，只需记下这个口诀：洪承皇滤倾斓孜

[Upgrade quote 179]Pure cosmic light.english: Your prisms now receive pristine, unadulterated photons from the other end of the universe.
[Upgrade quote 179]Pure cosmic light.chinese: 来自其他宇宙的纯正无暇的光子正在通过你的棱镜组。

[Upgrade quote 180]Rainbow grandmas.english: A luminous grandma to sparkle into cookies.
[Upgrade quote 180]Rainbow grandmas.chinese: 发光的老奶奶可以闪耀地变身成饼干。

[Upgrade quote 181]Season switcher.chinese:
因为世界上总有一个地方现在是正午。
所以世界上总有一个地方现在是圣诞。

[Upgrade quote 182]Festive biscuit.english: 'Twas the night before Christmas- or was it?
[Upgrade quote 182]Festive biscuit.chinese: 那是圣诞节的前一夜……来着？

[Upgrade quote 183]Ghostly biscuit.english:
spooky scary skeletons
will wake you with a boo
[Upgrade quote 183]Ghostly biscuit.chinese:
一只没有眼睛，一只没有尾巴，真奇怪！
真奇怪！

[Upgrade quote 184]Lovesick biscuit.english: Romance never goes out of fashion.

[Upgrade quote 300]Cookiemancy.english: There it is; the perfected school of baking magic. From summoning chips to hexing nuts, there is not a single part of cookie-making that hasn't been improved tenfold by magic tricks.
[Upgrade quote 300]Cookiemancy.chinese: 就是这里；完美的魔法烘焙学校。从召唤巧克力豆到诅咒各种坚果，饼干制作的任何一道工序都被魔法加强了十个档次。

[Upgrade quote 301]Dyson sphere.english: You've found a way to apply your knowledge of cosmic technology to slightly more local endeavors; this gigantic sphere of meta-materials, wrapping the solar system, is sure to kick your baking abilities up a notch.
[Upgrade quote 301]Dyson sphere.chinese: 你找到了一种方法，可以将你的宇宙技术知识应用到和你更相关的工作中来。这个巨大的超元材料球体包裹着太阳系，一定会让你的烘焙能力更上一层楼。

[Upgrade quote 302]Theory of atomic flui.english: Pushing alchemy to its most extreme limits, you find that everything is transmutable into anything else - lead to gold, mercury to water; more importantly, you realize that anything can -and should- be converted to cookies.
[Upgrade quote 302]Theory of atomic flui.chinese: 只要将炼金术发挥到极致，你就会发现一切都可以转化为其他任何东西——铅可以变成金、汞可以变成水；更重要的是，你意识到任何东西都可以——而且一定要——转化成饼干。

[Upgrade quote 304]Great loop hypothesis.english: What if our universe is just one instance of an infinite cycle? What if, before and after it, stretched infinite amounts of the same universe, themselves containing infinite amounts of cookies?
[Upgrade quote 304]Great loop hypothesis.chinese: 如果我们的宇宙只是一个无限循环的一个实例呢？如果在它之前和之后，延伸着无穷无尽的同一个宇宙，本身包含无穷无尽的饼干，那会怎样？

[Upgrade quote 305]The Pulse.english: You've tapped into the very pulse of the cosmos, a timeless rhythm along which every material and antimaterial thing beats in unison. This, somehow, means more cookies.
[Upgrade quote 305]The Pulse.chinese: 我们只是在宇宙的脉搏中活着，它保持着永恒的节奏，每一个物质和非物质的东西都沿着这个节奏一致地跳动。这——不知何故——意味着更多的饼干。

[Upgrade quote 306]Lux sanctorum.english: Your prism attendants have become increasingly mesmerized with something in the light - or maybe something beyond it; beyond us all, perhaps?
[Upgrade quote 306]Lux sanctorum.chinese: 你的棱镜维护员逐渐开始迷恋光里的影子——或许是超越光的存在；也可能是超越我们所有人的存在？

[Upgrade quote 307]The Unbridling.english: It might be a classic tale of bad parenting, but let's see where grandma is going with this.
[Upgrade quote 307]The Unbridling.chinese: 这可能是个典型失职父母的故事，但是还是看看老奶奶有什么打算吧。

[Upgrade quote 308]Wheat triffids.english:
Taking care of crops is so much easier when your plants can just walk about and help around the farm.
Do not pet. Do not feed. Do not attempt to converse with.
[Upgrade quote 308]Wheat triffids.chinese:
你的植物要是可以四处走动做做杂活，照顾农场就容易多了。
请不要向植物投食。不要试图与植物交谈。

[Upgrade quote 309]Canola oil wells.english: A previously untapped resource, canola oil permeates the underground olifers which grant it its particular taste and lucrative properties.
[Upgrade quote 309]Canola oil wells.chinese: 从未被开发的一种资源。菜籽油遍布在地下的橄榄树中，赋予它特殊的味道和让人难以拒绝的卖点。

[Upgrade quote 310]78-hour days.english: Why didn't we think of this earlier?
[Upgrade quote 310]78-hour days.chinese: 我们怎么没早想到这个方法呢？

[Upgrade quote 311]The stuff rationale.english: If not now, when? If not it, what? If not things... stuff?
[Upgrade quote 311]The stuff rationale.chinese: 此时不搏，更待何时？此事不平，何以平天下？此物非物……那它是啥来着？

[Upgrade quote 312]Theocracy.english:
You've turned your cookie empire into a perfect theocracy, gathering the adoration of zillions of followers from every corner of the universe.
Don't let it go to your head.
[Upgrade quote 312]Theocracy.chinese:
你把你的饼干帝国变成了一个完美的神权，聚集了来自宇宙每个角落的数十亿追随者的崇拜。
不要太过于沾沾自喜了。

[Upgrade quote 313]Rabbit trick.english:
Using nothing more than a fancy top hat, your wizards have found a way to simultaneously curb rabbit population and produce heaps of extra cookies for basically free!
Resulting cookies may or may not be fit for vegans.
[Upgrade quote 313]Rabbit trick.chinese:
你们的巫师们只用了一顶花哨的高帽，就找到了同时抑制兔子数量和生产大量额外饼干的方法，而且基本上零成本！
副作用就是这饼干可能不能算素食了。

[Upgrade quote 314]The final frontier.english: It's been a long road, getting from there to here. It's all worth it though - the sights are lovely and the oil prices slightly more reasonable.
[Upgrade quote 314]The final frontier.chinese: 从那里到这里是一条漫长的道路。不过这一路都是值得的——这里的风景很美，油价也比那里合理一些。

[Upgrade quote 315]Beige goo.english: Well now you've done it. Good job. Very nice. That's 3 galaxies you've just converted into cookies. Good thing you can hop from universe to universe.
[Upgrade quote 315]Beige goo.chinese: 行吧，一般人也干不出这事来。事已至此，我也只能说：干的漂亮，你把三个星系都变成了饼干。庆幸的是，你还是可以在宇宙之间穿梭。

[Upgrade quote 316]Maddening chants.english: A popular verse goes like so : "jau'hn madden jau'hn madden aeiouaeiouaeiou brbrbrbrbrbrbr"
[Upgrade quote 316]Maddening chants.chinese: 一句比较常见的诗词是这么说的：“龵冖，发狂吧。发狂吧，龵冖。啊婀伊呜淤啊婀伊呜淤啊婀伊呜淤，突突突突突突突突突。”

[Upgrade quote 317]Cookietopian moments.english: Reminiscing how things could have been, should have been, will have been.
[Upgrade quote 317]Cookietopian moments.chinese: 怀念以前的时光本来是怎样的，应该是怎样的，将会是怎样的。

[Upgrade quote 318]Some other super-tiny.english: When even the universe is running out of ideas, that's when you know you're nearing the end.
[Upgrade quote 318]Some other super-tiny.chinese: 当连宇宙都没有想法的时候，你就知道你已经接近尾声了。

[Upgrade quote 319]Reverse shadows.english: Oh man, this is really messing with your eyes.
[Upgrade quote 319]Reverse shadows.chinese: 好家伙，这快把你的眼睛都搞花了。

[Upgrade quote 321]Kitten specialists.english: optimeowzing your workflow like whoah, sir
[Upgrade quote 321]Kitten specialists.chinese: 正在努力优化你的工序喵，先生。

[Upgrade quote 322]Kitten experts.english: 10 years expurrrtise in the cookie business, sir
[Upgrade quote 322]Kitten experts.chinese: 我有十年做饼干生意的经验喵，先生。

[Upgrade quote 323]How to bake your drag.english: A tome full of helpful tips such as "oh god, stay away from it", "why did we buy this thing, it's not even house-broken" and "groom twice a week in the direction of the scales".
[Upgrade quote 323]How to bake your drag.chinese: 一本充满有用建议的文集，里面有《妈呀，可不要接近它》、《又不能毁灭一个小镇，我们买它来干啥》和《顺着龙鳞每日梳理两次》。

[Upgrade quote 324]A crumbly egg.english:
Thank you for adopting this robust, fun-loving cookie dragon! It will bring you years of joy and entertainment.
Keep in a dry and cool place, and away from other house pets. Subscription to home insurance is strongly advised.
[Upgrade quote 324]A crumbly egg.chinese:
感谢您领养这只健壮又好动的饼干龙！它会带给你好几年的喜悦和娱乐。
请保存在阴凉干燥处，远离其他家养宠物。强烈推荐购买住房保险。

[Upgrade quote 325]Chimera.english: More than the sum of its parts.

[Upgrade quote 326]Tin of butter cookies.english:
Five varieties of danish cookies.
Complete with little paper cups.
[Upgrade quote 326]Tin of butter cookies.chinese:
五种不同的丹麦饼干。
内含小纸杯。

[Upgrade quote 327]Golden switch.chinese: 更少的点击，更多的挂机。

[Upgrade quote 328]Classic dairy selecti.chinese: 据说有平缓心情的功效，正好治治你这牛脾气。

[Upgrade quote 329]Fanciful dairy select.english: Strong bones for the skeleton army.
[Upgrade quote 329]Fanciful dairy select.chinese: 骷髅军团指定补钙品。“腰不酸了腿不疼了，走路也有劲了，一口气上五楼，不费劲儿。”

[Upgrade quote 330]Dragon cookie.english: Imbued with the vigor and vitality of a full-grown cookie dragon, this mystical cookie will embolden your empire for the generations to come.
[Upgrade quote 330]Dragon cookie.chinese: 这块神秘的饼干被赋予了一条成熟的饼干龙的活力和生命力，它将助你的帝国源远流长。

[Upgrade quote 334]Milk chocolate butter.english:
Rewarded for owning 100 of everything.
It bears the engraving of a fine entrepreneur.
[Upgrade quote 334]Milk chocolate butter.chinese:
拥有 100 个所有建筑的奖励。
上面雕刻着一位优秀企业家的形象。

[Upgrade quote 335]Dark chocolate butter.english:
Rewarded for owning 150 of everything.
It is adorned with the image of an experienced cookie tycoon.
[Upgrade quote 335]Dark chocolate butter.chinese:
拥有 150 个所有建筑的奖励。
上面装饰着一个经验丰富的饼干大亨的形象。

[Upgrade quote 336]White chocolate butte.english:
Rewarded for owning 200 of everything.
The chocolate is chiseled to depict a masterful pastry magnate.
[Upgrade quote 336]White chocolate butte.chinese:
拥有 200 个所有建筑的奖励。
巧克力上刻着一个水平一流的糕点巨头。

[Upgrade quote 337]Ruby chocolate butter.english:
Rewarded for owning 250 of everything.
Covered in a rare red chocolate, this biscuit is etched to represent the face of a cookie industrialist gone mad with power.
[Upgrade quote 337]Ruby chocolate butter.chinese:
拥有 250 个所有建筑的奖励。
裹着罕见的红色巧克力外壳，这块饼干蚀刻着一个被权力冲昏头脑的饼干工业家的面容。

[Achievement quote 77]Fortune.english: You should really go to bed.
[Achievement quote 77]Fortune.chinese: 讲真的，你该上床睡觉了。

[Achievement quote 78]True Neverclick.english: This kinda defeats the whole purpose, doesn't it?
[Achievement quote 78]True Neverclick.chinese: 这游戏大概不是这么玩的吧？

[Achievement quote 80]Elder slumber.chinese:
我们的心灵
无尽的延续
超越了宇宙

[Achievement quote 86]Nihilism.english:
There are many things
that need to be erased
[Achievement quote 86]Nihilism.chinese:
很多事物
本不应该存在

[Achievement quote 127]Lord of Construct.english: He saw the vast plains stretching ahead of him, and he said : let there be civilization.
[Achievement quote 127]Lord of Construct.chinese: 他放眼望着广阔的平原。许久，他说："这里需要文明、这里需要社会。"

[Achievement quote 128]Lord of Progress.english: One can always do better. But should you?
[Achievement quote 128]Lord of Progress.chinese: 总有人要当废物，那为什么不能是你呢？

[Achievement quote 132]Tiny cookie.english:
These aren't the cookies
you're clicking for.
[Achievement quote 132]Tiny cookie.chinese:
这些饼干
不是你该点的。

[Achievement quote 133]You win a cookie.english: We're all so proud of you.
[Achievement quote 133]You win a cookie.chinese: 如此成就。大家都为你骄傲。

[Achievement quote 159]God complex.english: But that's not you, is it?

[Achievement quote 160]Third-party.english: Some find vanilla to be the most boring flavor.
[Achievement quote 160]Third-party.chinese: 有些人觉得，雪糕只有奶油味的话最无趣了。

[Achievement quote 162]Nil zero zilch.english: To summarize : really not very much at all.
[Achievement quote 162]Nil zero zilch.chinese: 细数一下的话，其实没有多少。

[Achievement quote 163]Transcendence.english: Your cookies are now on a higher plane of being.
[Achievement quote 163]Transcendence.chinese: 你的饼干大概已经是更高一层的存在了。

[Achievement quote 164]Obliterate.chinese: 不要做无谓的抵抗，虽然看你努力的样子的确很滑稽。

[Achievement quote 165]Negative void.english: You now have so few cookies that it's almost like you have a negative amount of them.
[Achievement quote 165]Negative void.chinese: 你现在饼干数量少的简直跟负数一样。

[Achievement quote 204]Here you go.english: All you had to do was ask.
[Achievement quote 204]Here you go.chinese: 你要是早点开口，我就早给你了。

[Achievement quote 229]In the mouth of m.english: A cookie is just what we tell each other it is.
[Achievement quote 229]In the mouth of m.chinese: 饼干，不过是人类之间传播的一个名词罢了。

[Achievement name 234]Cookiehertz : a re.comment: 这个Cookiehertz应该是Cookie hurts的谐音。引文中的a hertz donut也能查到相关的谐音梗'it hurts, don't it?'
[Achievement name 234]Cookiehertz : a re.english: Cookiehertz : a really, really tasty hertz
[Achievement name 234]Cookiehertz : a re.chinese: 热疼疼的饼干：痛并美味着

[Achievement quote 234]Cookiehertz : a r.english: Tastier than a hertz donut, anyway.
[Achievement quote 234]Cookiehertz : a r.chinese: 营养丰富。而且至少比维生素C泡疼片更有味。

[Achievement quote 236]Turbopuns.english: Mother Nature will be like "slowwwww dowwwwwn".
[Achievement quote 236]Turbopuns.chinese: 大自然母亲大概会说："车太快了，慢点开吧。"

[Achievement quote 243]Tabloid addiction.english:
Page 6: Mad individual clicks on picture of pastry in a futile attempt to escape boredom!
Also page 6: British parliament ate my baby!
[Achievement quote 243]Tabloid addiction.chinese:
第六页：城市娱乐活动逐渐单调化。为缓解无聊，本地一疯子狂点一张甜点的照片。
还是第六页：英国议会吃了我的孩子！

[Achievement quote 246]Thumbs, phalanges.comment: 索尼克梗，认识的都认识，不认识的翻译了也没用，上原文

[Achievement quote 247]Polymath.english: Excellence doesn't happen overnight - it usually takes a good couple days.
[Achievement quote 247]Polymath.chinese: 杰出的成就并不会一夜惊起，通常来说还是需要个一两天的。

[Achievement quote 248]The elder scrolls.english: Let me guess. Someone stole your cookie.
[Achievement quote 248]The elder scrolls.chinese: 要我猜的话，大概是有谁偷走了你的饼干。

[Achievement quote 268]Year's worth of c.english: My lumps my lumps my lumps.

[Achievement quote 273]Tricentennial.english: Can't stop, won't stop. Probably should stop, though.
[Achievement quote 273]Tricentennial.chinese: 收手？，收手是不可能收手的，这辈子不可能收手的。（但是大概是时候收手了。）

[Achievement quote 274]Knead for speed.comment: 这个大概没什么太好的翻译方法，愿意大概是"这双关我们怎么还没用过？"，但是原翻译是不可能看出来是双关的。所以改了成就名往原文的双关靠了下。
[Achievement quote 274]Knead for speed.english: How did we not make that one yet?
[Achievement quote 274]Knead for speed.chinese: 我们不是在做饼啊？不过有模具就可以切成饼干了。

[Achievement quote 275]Well the cookies.english: Didn't make sense not to click for fun.

[Achievement quote 277]The proof of the.english: How can you have any cookies if you don't bake your dough?
[Achievement quote 277]The proof of the.chinese: 你不把面饼放烤箱是怎么做出来饼干的？

[Achievement name 289]Here he comes.comment: 因为中文不能叠那些奇葩字符，做了个css动画。TODO：继续补全成就
[Achievement name 289]Here he comes.chinese: 他 来 了
